message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and this is a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm willing to pay that price, and I believe it's a fair deal for both of us.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $9,000.  I believe the product's value justifies this price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $8,500. I think that's the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at this price?
